kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance. Use this keyword for quick experiments or debugging sessions. Use `New Page` directly instead of `Open Browser` for production and automated execution. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Browser and related concepts.
kw.msg: Open Browser is for quick experimentation and debugging only. Use New Page for production.

{"acceptDownloads": false, "ignoreHTTPSErrors": false, "bypassCSP": false, "deviceScaleFactor": 1.0, "isMobile": false, "hasTouch": false, "javaScriptEnabled": true, "offline": false, "hideRfBrowser": false}

Successfully created context with options: {"acceptDownloads": false, "ignoreHTTPSErrors": false, "bypassCSP": false, "deviceScaleFactor": 1, "isMobile": false, "hasTouch": false, "javaScriptEnabled": true, "offline": false, "hideRfBrowser": false}
Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://parodify.herokuapp.com/users/sign_in

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``text`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'vutu.goes@gmail.com' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``text`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text '123789' in the given field.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Wait for Element with selector: css=a[href="/users/sign_out"]

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current window and saves it.
